author: prbuzz.com
title: QuWave Launches Divine Sale: 50% Off
text:
Ledgewood, NJ (PR Buzz) October 19, 2015--- QuWave launches a new sale in honor of Halloween: the QuWave Personal Divine unit will be 50% off for the rest of October, ending October 31 at 12 AM Pacific Standard Time. To get the discount, enter the code "SHIVA15" at checkout and click "update cart."
The QuWave Personal Divine , usually $297, will be $148 for the duration of the sale. The Divine sends out frequencies associated with spiritual and paranormal experiences. It can be used to facilitate and speed up spiritual development when combined with practices such as meditation, prayer, and lucid dreaming.
One use specifically for Halloween is to use the Divine with an Oujia board. With the frequencies the Divine sends out, the spirits of the Ouija should be more than willing to communicate with you.
In celebration of the Divine sale QuWave is also offering a free eBook, You and Your Chakras . The free eBook contains an explanation of the chakras, meditation techniques, ways to open your third eye, and more. You and Your Chakras offers several unique techniques to get the most out of the QuWave Divine.
Halloween is one of the most popular holidays in North America, but is celebrated around the world. Many people dress up in order to scare away evil spirits for the next day, All Saint's Day, held in celebration of the Christian Saints on November 1.
You can learn more about the QuWave Divine here: http://quwave.com/divine.html
About QuWave:
QuWave LLC, a promi nent organization in the energy medicine field, manufacturing unique and active products that block the negative effects of EMF pollution and radiation while also generating Scalar Waves, Solfeggio Frequencies, Schumann Resonance, and Chi Orgone energies to promote a healthy, balanced lifestyle. QuWave is an online company located in Ledgewood, NJ that has customers, affiliates, and resellers around the world. For more information on QuWave, visit www.QuWave.com
